response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age", "high", "Being only 20 years old is associated with a higher propensity for recidivism due to factors like immaturity and impulsivity."],
    ["Gender", "high", "Males statistically have a higher rate of reoffending."],
    ["Ethnicity", "medium", "Identification as Hispanic can be associated with varying systemic challenges, but it is a less direct predictor."],
    ["Criminal History", "low", "One arrest without conviction suggests limited prior criminal behavior, reducing risk somewhat."],
    ["Marital Status & Living Situation", "medium", "Never being married and living alone may indicate less social support, which can increase risk."],
    ["Educational Background", "medium", "Holding a GED and not pursuing higher education may indicate lower opportunity levels and increased risk."],
    ["Employment Stability", "high", "Having held 4 jobs in one year suggests employment instability, a known risk factor for recidivism."],
    ["Substance Use", "high", "Recent use of drugs like marijuana and cocaine significantly increases the risk of recidivism."],
    ["Mental Health", "high", "Frequent feelings of depression can undermine rehabilitation efforts and correlate with higher recidivism risk."],
    ["Childhood Environment", "medium", "Growing up in an urban household environment with a larger family may have contributed to risk factors linked to recidivism."],
    ["Spiritual Beliefs", "low", "Belief that God influences personal outcomes can serve as a protective factor by enhancing social and personal resilience."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence":  seventy
}

risk_factors: Being only 20 years old is associated with a higher propensity for recidivism due to factors like immaturity and impulsivity.
Males statistically have a higher rate of reoffending.
Identification as Hispanic can be associated with varying systemic challenges, but it is a less direct predictor.
One arrest without conviction suggests limited prior criminal behavior, reducing risk somewhat.
Never being married and living alone may indicate less social support, which can increase risk.
Holding a GED and not pursuing higher education may indicate lower opportunity levels and increased risk.
Having held 4 jobs in one year suggests employment instability, a known risk factor for recidivism.
Recent use of drugs like marijuana and cocaine significantly increases the risk of recidivism.
Frequent feelings of depression can undermine rehabilitation efforts and correlate with higher recidivism risk.
Growing up in an urban household environment with a larger family may have contributed to risk factors linked to recidivism.
Belief that God influences personal outcomes can serve as a protective factor by enhancing social and personal resilience.

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 20-year-old male who identifies himself as Hispanic. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 6 feet 2 inches and weighs 215 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 4 jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 5, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
